history.text: Are you a fan of superhero movies?
Oh, absolutely.
Iron Man is one I would recommend from 2008.
Do you like the Tony Stark character or is it the tech that roped you in?
The Tony Stark character, Robert Downey Jr. does a great job.
Right? He was the perfect pick for Tony Stark. He's good at being arrogant but lovable.
Agreed.  The movie got 94% on Rotten Tomatoes.
I think that's fair. It's entertaining and well written.
Do you usually like movies with good ratings?
Honestly, that never really played too much of a role when it came to choosing a movie to watch. I've enjoyed movies with terrible ratings
I like the scenes that take place in war-torn Afghanistan.
Were there a lot of fight scenes?

Yes, quite a few.  
I also like the scene where Colonel James Rhodes demonstrates the "Jericho" missile.
Can you tell me how he did that?

He launched the missile as a demonstration.  Shortly after the convoy is ambushed and Stark is critically
 wounded.
Is this after he's got his Iron Man suit?

He reveals the suit after the charity event where he learns that Stane has been trafficking
 arms.
What didn't you like about the movie. Really, what could have been done better?
I think the story is pretty brief when Stark is shot by the military plane while flying in the suit.  You would think they would require more of an explanation.
Oh, so it felt pretty abrupt when they cut to that scene. I like one-shot action scenes, like how John Wick was done.
It is definitely not a deal breaker for the movie.
No, Marvel Universe movies are some of my favorites. What else did you like about it?
I liked the scene where Stark loses the reactor from his chest and needs to get a replacement.
How did that happen? Did it fall out or was he in a fight?

Stane takes it during an ambush 
at his home.
I can't even remember half the plot at this point, I was maybe 20 when that movie first came out. Might end up watching it again.
It is one I have watched several times.
Well then, you're probably excited for Infinity War :)

uid1response.feedback: It helps that I really enjoy that genre to begin with but I thought the conversation went well. The other person described certain instances that made the movie sound action packed, which is always a plus.
